game.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • game.game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Thread
    매치 하나에 대응되는 클래스
    사용 방법:
    Game game=new Game(5);
    game.addPlayer("Name");
    game.play();
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ycm
